description:
Galaxia is revealed to be the Legendary Sailor Guardian who sealed away Chaos long ago. However, she has since become corrupt and has gone on to conquer the galaxy herself...
Source: hulu

titles.title: Kibou no Hikari! Ginga o Kaketa Saishuu Kessen
La luz de la Esperanza. La última batalla para dominar la vía Lactea.
The Light of Hope: The Final Battle for the Galaxy
希望の光! 銀河をかけた最終決戦
